mapper.select:
select
from SYS_DIR
and PK_FATHER = #{pkFather}
ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_DIR (PK_NODE, PK_ORG, PK_ROOT, PK_FATHER, ORD_NODE, NAME_NODE, REMARK, ICO_NODE, DEL_FLAG, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, NODE_TYPE, PK_BD,SORT_NO ) values (#{pkNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkRoot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkFather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icoNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pkBd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sortNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_DIR
and PK_FATHER = #{pkFather}

mapper.update:
update SYS_DIR
PK_ORG = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_ROOT = #{pkRoot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_FATHER = #{pkFather,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORD_NODE = #{ordNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_NODE = #{nameNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SYS_DIR set PK_ORG = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_ROOT = #{pkRoot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_FATHER = #{pkFather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORD_NODE = #{ordNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_NODE = #{nameNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICO_NODE = #{icoNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, NODE_TYPE = #{nodeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_BD = #{pkBd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_NODE = #{pkNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
